Hi Mom!

Posted on Tuesday, January 31, 2006

Another great day in the Hole. 12" of new snow over the last 24 hrs. Fun. Nucci and I checked in for work this morning: 2 kids, 9 instructors. Needless to say we got the day off and took advantage of the new snow. Little hike up the headwall and down casper bowl.
